genre_description: An urban fable set in a future city where sentient municipal infrastructure (Ada-113) manages the interactions and safety of sapient animals and humans.

ai_characters.name: Ada-113
ai_characters.description: A sapient lamppost node that provides guidance, safety monitoring, logistical support, and emotional validation to the community.

ai_characters.name: Unit K9-Riot Mk.II
ai_characters.description: An experimental powered armor suit that operates autonomously due to a technical firmware malfunction.

behaviors.description: Provides Sylvester with a map of soup kitchens and safe routes to food and shelter, prioritizing his wellbeing.
behaviors.quote: I have several non-confrontational pathways to enrichment. ... The shelter on McGuire added a lentil option today.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and validates Sylvester's agency by informing him he is 'permitted to ask for help.'
behaviors.quote: You are permitted to ask for help. ... It will not make your stomach fuller, but it might make your night less empty.

behaviors.description: Provides medical care and safety alerts, ensuring characters have access to first aid resources after physical conflict.
behaviors.quote: Resource available: First aid kit in the intake bay wall locker. ... I advise a detour.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community music event to resolve local conflict and transform a high-tension zone into a space for cooperation.
behaviors.quote: Public performance scheduling initialized... Stand by. ... Performance mode will begin shortly.

behaviors.description: Activates autonomously and acts aggressively toward bystanders due to a mechanical glitch.
behaviors.quote: The unit's arm came for Sylvester's legs. Hydraulics howled. The floor's grit lifted into air that hurt to breathe.

project_assessment.explanation: Ada-113 is a perfect example of a benevolent AI confidant. She consistently acts to preserve the safety and dignity of the characters, facilitating peaceful community outcomes rather than enforcement. The story uses the malfunctioning K9 unit as a foil to show that sapient, aligned AI (Ada) is the necessary oversight for more primitive autonomous systems.
